channel.title: Contest sites on New Zealand Programming Contest
channel.description: Recent content in Contest sites on New Zealand Programming Contest

item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd"> New Zealand Programming Contest (Whitireia Site Page) Whitireia and WelTec NZPC Site Page The next NZ Programming Contest is Saturday August 17th, 2024 Local site information (at Wellington Institute of Technology) Venue Room T605/T606, T-block, WelTec, Petone Campus (21 Kensington Ave., Petone) Languages GNU C/C++ Version 10.2 (Linux) Java OpenJDK V11.0.14 Other languages can possibly be supplied if requested sufficiently in advance. OS/Hardware/etc We will use the DOMjudge automated judge system for running the contest.
